name: VNDetectBarcodesRequest
desc: A request that detects barcodes in an image.

items.name: func supportedSymbologies() -> [VNBarcodeSymbology]
items.desc: Returns the barcode symbologies that the request supports.

items.name: var symbologies: [VNBarcodeSymbology]
items.desc: The barcode symbologies that the request detects in an image.

items.name: struct VNBarcodeSymbology
items.desc: The barcode symbologies that the framework detects.

items.name: var results: [VNBarcodeObservation]?
items.desc: The results of a barcode detection request.

items.name: class VNBarcodeObservation
items.desc: An object that represents barcode information that an image analysis request detects.

items.name: let VNDetectBarcodesRequestRevision2: Int
items.desc: Revision 2 of the barcode detection algorithm.

items.name: let VNDetectBarcodesRequestRevision1: Int
items.desc: Revision 1 of the barcode detection algorithm.
